title: How to Be Less Nervous and More Confident on a Date
description:
Have you ever been on an awkward date? Do you feel intimidated or frustrated by the dating scene? You’re not alone, girl. In this episode, Jordan welcomes author, blogger, and speaker, Stephanie May Wilson, as they discuss how to navigate the wild west of dating. You’ll share some laughs as these two share awkward, first date stories – and chances are, you’ll find a piece of your story in theirs. Tune in and learn helpful ideas you can put into action on your very next date - and find out how awesome things can come from our most awkward moments.

Want to take the conversation further? Check out Jordan’s faith-based resource on dating and relationships:

https://jlmedia.lpages.co/beloved-14-day-devotional/

@Jordanleedooley

@Shepodcast

Episode More Info: http://jordanleedooley.com/how-to-be-less-nervous-on-a-date/ 

http://lastingmediagroup.com/she
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
